I'm a recreational photographer of 5+ years. I used to specialize in sports photography for my high school Athletics Department, in particular
the Cross Country + Track and Field teams. Now, I do mostly events and nature. 
All photos are for personal, non-commercial use only and are not monetized in any way. 

## Duke Gardens

I served as a volunteer photographer at the Sarah P. Duke gardens in Spring of 2025, and was lucky to capture both some iconic cherry blossoms
and the first true snow day in the Triangle in several years. I'm a complete amateur at flowers, so please contact me to correct
any mislabelings: [xiran.wang@duke.edu](mailto:xiran.wang@duke.edu)

function changeSlide(n, gallery) {
  const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel-' + gallery);
  const images = carousel.querySelectorAll('.carousel-image');
  let currentIndex = Array.from(images).findIndex(img => img.classList.contains('active'));
  
  currentIndex = (currentIndex + n + images.length) % images.length;
  
  images.forEach(img => img.classList.remove('active'));
  images[currentIndex].classList.add('active');
  images[currentIndex].loading = 'eager';
  
  document.getElementById('current-photo-' + gallery).textContent = currentIndex + 1;
  document.getElementById('photo-description-' + gallery).textContent = photoDescriptions[gallery][currentIndex];
}
